main event: A Sergeant in the U.S. Air Force observed a round white light in the sky moving slowly with a pulsating action in Petersburg, Virginia.
interesting points: The light was observed for approximately 5-7 minutes.,The light was estimated to be 40 degrees above the horizon.,The light's movement was described as slow and pulsating or flashing.,The witness speculated that it could be a military aircraft.,Additional sketches showed the object's path and position.
sighted object: a round white light in the sky
witness description: Sergeant in the U.S. Air Force
